website_summaries.verdict: Rechargeable electric toothbrush that is made primarily for those wearing braces.
pros: Uses an inter-dental brush head specifically designed to handle hard-to-reach areas around braces
Has 3 different brushing modes to help with sensitive gums
Reasonable price point for an electric toothbrush
cons: May not last as long as you'd like
Brush heads seem a little small

customer_reviews.title: Awsome for kids with braces
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10yr who just got braces. She was struggling in cleaning around an under the wires. She loves this toothbrush. It makes it so easy to clean her braces, it came with 4 different heads an 1 head has a point an she can get under the wires even around the little brackets an in between them. I'm going get one of these for me too. If you have a child struggling to clean thier teeth correctly then this brush is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: susan p.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, I got it like 4 weeks ago and still haven’t charged it, it works perfect and I love how my teeth feel after. It also came with a gift. I’m very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This electric toothbrush works fantastically for the price. Just as good as my sonicare. A free interdental brush head came in the box which is excellent because i have braces. My teeth are much cleaner when i use this instead of a manual. I like the five different modes. I use the white and clean mode. My elementary school aged daughters use the sensitive mode.
customer_reviews.author: kitani walton

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Sonic Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This sonic toothbrush is not only a great brush, it is a great deal. I have used Oral B and Philips Sonic toothbrushes for many years and this toothbrush gives a better clean. We already own a black model and now we have a pink one too. The color is adorable and the brush is wonderful. Grab one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Tonk Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best toothbrush  !!
customer_reviews.text: So If y’all have braces like me !! Get this toothbrush!!! Throw away your regular toothbrush as get this! my teeth looks wayyy better and I couldn’t be happier! That battery life is amazingly long before another charge and it comes with multiple brush heads !
customer_reviews.author: LiyaaDaDonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush ever! Great quality affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush. It is super easy to use and easy to handle. It gets your teeth cleaner faster and better than just a regular toothbrush. I am in love with it!! I definitely recommend this product to anyone.. it is very affordable considering the excellent quality of it! It looks so elegant and sleek and it works so well that I actually enjoy brushing my teeth. I am not kidding when I say that you must try this product! I promise you will not regret the purchase. It’s well well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: My new fave.
customer_reviews.text: This Fairywill is my new fave brush. My old fave, the "Dazzle Pro", is not available anymore with the older style thin handle. Too bad, since it has worked well for almost ten years. This Fairywill has a bit fatter handle than the very thin Dazzle, but is thinner than a Sonic-care. Sonic-care rattled my brain, and was too rough on my gums, and too fat in the grip. This Fairywill is just right. In between the Sonic and the Dazzle in power and handle thickness. This Fairywill has a small head which fits in my mouth better than a round head oral-B. Perfect so far. As long as it keeps working this way, I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: SpielArt

customer_reviews.title: Upon delivery & charging...this brush is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: So far, after owning the brush for only a few days, I have found the sonic brush lighter to hold in my hand, and far more convenient than dealing with the more expensive, heavier feeling, thicker handled, brush of the more expensive brands that still come with charger bases. In fact, the battery operated sonic technology is now used by my dental hygienist...and she says that it's the popular wave of the future. No large expensive apparatus and parts that are cumbersome to handle effectively with each patient. Feeling the same way about this battery-charged, USB connecting, wonderful sonic brush: I love it!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Irish 12

customer_reviews.title: I got a defective one but received awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush I received was evidently defective - worked for a week then died. Since I had thrown away the packaging (as I really liked it when received - worked great and pink style looked nice on my countertop), I did not believe I could get a refund. I had posted an unhappy review and seller contacted me - and offered a refund or replacement. As I had already replaced from a brick & mortar shop, I chose the refund....and received almost immediately. Giving this a 5 in my updated review as you would either get a functional, nice looking product or stand-up service if something went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate -- Just BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fantastic toothbrush! Beautiful and sleek looking but powerful as well...Thank you for making such a great product! This is the best toothbrush I have ever owned and I have purchased many...the USB charging feature is awesome as well...Thank you, thank you, thank you!!! I will refer other people to purchase this product as well. I would give it 10 stars if I could! :) Kim
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sims

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied and happy
customer_reviews.text: This electric toothbrush cleans my teeth very well and makes my mouth feel good. The charge last more than a month and it's a quick easy charge. I like how it comes with another brush head and pick brush but I wish it came with a travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Kukana

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence, just get it. It is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this toothbrush... it is the best $20 I’ve spent in a long time! I don’t have an outlet in my bathroom, so my super expensive Sonicare has been retired for a long time. And I (did) miss it because I’m pretty serious about clean teeth. But not anymore. This toothbrush is ever bit as good at a fraction of the price! The battery lasts for a long, long time plus give you ample warning when it’s time to charge. My expensive toothbrush didn’t pause after 30 seconds, which is the perfect feature for my brain, particularly in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! My teeth have never felt cleaner. I like the 3 options, I didn't think I would have chosen the "soft" speed, but it is just the right amount of cleaning power. Enjoying it daily!!
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: Simply love this version of a Sonic toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a $180 Sonic care toothbrush and it did not leave my teeth and whole mouth being as clean and fresh as this does! For $15, this included the tooth brush complete with different models of usage as well as 3 brush heads, one brush head cover, and a flosser that makes me laugh each time I use it (I've never had something tickle in my mouth. As promised, a full cycle lasts the ADA's recommendation of a full 2 minutes brushing(at which point it will automatically shut off), and this comes with a reminder of sorts (just a shot paus every 30 seconds to switch to the next quadrant of your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: India Dausch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for the price and I have to say I'm pleasantly suprised. The brush is stylish and light weight. Comes with multiple heads and has 3 settings. It is strong without vibrating my ear canals. I've had brushes that causes my ears to become irritated. I would definitely recommend this toothbrush, however I have a ton of usb to walk socket heads laying around. I was perplexed when I saw the charging cable was usb only. Most people don't have usb chargers in their bathroom yet so I added the wall socket attachment to my charger.
customer_reviews.author: Tialisa Whipple

customer_reviews.title: First timer.
customer_reviews.text: I hated electric toothbrushes but I thought why not I only have these teeth once. The motor is as silent as can be. The timer starts once you start. It didn't have a mount to charge but just use your computer or something that has a usb will be sufficient. The bristles are soft and comfortable. I'm really enjoying it. I honestly wouldn't think I'd ever say that. 2 minutes goes by quick. I'm a less is more kinda guy and this is a perfect fit which is why I didn't go all out for those $70+ ones. Like how much more can it do? Also verified by the ADA so Kevin McCallister would approve..
customer_reviews.author: Shooker

customer_reviews.title: Best-looking toothbrush I’ve ever seen...but not sure I can stand the high “buzz” rate
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really sleek design. I think it works ok at cleaning teeth, but it vibrates at such a high speed that, between the high pitched sound and the way it makes my teeth “itch” when it touches them, I’m just not sure I will be able to stand it in the long run. So, I’m using it every day to see how it goes...I’m still cringing a bit when it touches my teeth, at least a month later, so....but it looks SO fabulous! What am I to do? 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Aud

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our daughter at college. She's been using a Sonicare for years, but her mom and I took ownership of it when she left and she was using a manual toothbrush again. I knew that space is a rare commodity when living in a dorm so I wanted to find something that didn't require a cradle to recharge or disposable batteries. The reviews on the Fairywill were great, the USB charging answered the no-cradle problem, and I knew she'd love the pink color. I was right on the color, and my daughter says it works better than her Sonicare. Only time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Ohana of 3Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush (so far)
customer_reviews.text: I just received this brush and so far its great! I used to use a spinning electric toothbrush and while it cleaned my teeth really well, it also made them very sensitive. I wanted to try a sonic toothbrush but didn't want to invest too much money into one. This brush is gentle enough but does a thorough job cleaning. I have a very small mouth and this brush is perfect-- its also comfortable to hold. I'll update if i run into any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome performance at a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I cannot believe the value in the quality of this toothbrush. It comes fully charged, and works like a charm. Having had the same sonicare for at least 15 years, I couldn't believe how lightweight, effective, this toothbrush was especially because of its multi-speed/multi-pulse settings. Overall it seems to be a well-made product. And so unbelievably easy to learn and understand. many thanks to the manufacturer for providing a high quality Sonic clean for my teeth at a fraction of the price of regular Sonic toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimstress

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this toothbrush with her birthday money. She loves it! She loves all of the attachments and different modes. The first day she got it, she brushed her teeth 4 times. This is a huge mommy win! Anything to get a kid excited about brushing their teeth is a deal to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush! The different settings are very nice, sometimes my lupus causes me gums to inflame and most other brushes actually are quite painful. ..since this brush they've only been swollen once, which is awesome, and my gums over one tooth was beginning to recede and I swear it's not anymore! !!! The only thing is I wish they had the option to purchase a bigger head for the brush...other than that I absolutely love the way it cleans and makes my mouth feel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sold for life!
customer_reviews.text: Going from having to count minute, and often messing up, to carelessly focusing on brushing and wanting to brush longer than 2 minutes has been amazing. I love this. I now get it. I've tried similar toothbrushes I've found on shelves, and never felt a difference so I'd always go back to regular toothbrushes. This brush, I can already tell, will bring out my loyalty. I'll be buying my friends and family this for Christmas. It's a must have!
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and makes my teeth feel extra clean!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this tooth brush for 3 weeks now twice a day or if not more sometimes and I haven’t had to charge it yet! I’m amazing on the battery life I use the tooth brush for about 2 minutes at a time and it’s been a reliable tooth brush. I got a deal for it when I ordered it for half the price on the black one and paid full price for the pink since it wasn’t on sell. I read the reviews half put me on edge but took the chance and I think it was worth it! I feel like my teeth are sparkly than ever and the polish feature was an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Quick to get used to
customer_reviews.text: 2-minute timer in 30 second periods. I don't use all the different settings - just the "clean" setting and that seems to work fine. I think it charged to full battery in less than an hour - but it may have had a partial charge out of the box. I really like the included plastic cover for the brush head - it fits snugly but also seems to allow the brush head to dry out between uses. My dentist didn't comment on anything unusual when I switched to this toothbrush (after using a non-sonic electric toothbrush for almost a year), so I guess that means it works as well as my previous toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Dookwah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as an expensive Oral-B or Philips Sonicare but works good for the price. The only complaint is I dislike the short shut off every minute or so. Might be a good feature for children but kind of annoying to me. I wish it would just shut off after the recommended total time to brush your teeth was up. I can live with the short shut offs but still annoying. This is the only reason I didn't give it a 5 star for this toothbrush. Otherwise good product and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lee

customer_reviews.title: My teeth have never been so clean
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate brushing my teeth because it was a task for me. I was never able to get my teeth clean well enough and as much as I wanted with manual toothbrushes. I bought this a savior, and it’s great. I have bad overcrowding and overlapping but all the moving bristles get in between teeth and on my gum line well! I considered this toothbrush or the more expensive Phillips and etc, honestly this is great for a first automatic toothbrush and I won’t be switching as of now. Highly recommended👍
customer_reviews.author: Lanni K.

customer_reviews.title: It works! Does a very good job if cleaning my teeth.
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush is as promised, a sonic cleaning toothbrush. I have never used an electric toothbrush before so this is new to me, so I first just turned it on and rubbed it across my teeth, it didn't work so well. I then brushed my teeth normally with the toothbrush turned on, and what a difference, it cleans my teeth almost as good as the dentist does when they polish them. Still not sure why there are four different selections on the start button, but I was never a big fan of instructions, just push the button and it works...Good!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dressler

customer_reviews.title: Vibrations too strong. EXCELLENT REPLACEMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these. The vibrations bothered my teeth too much to get a good clean out of it. *UPDATE* The company reached out to me and offered a gentler version of the toothbrush. I was very happy to know a company would stand behind their product enough to reach out and rectify. I was up for trying it. They shipped me the Fairywill Toothbrush FW2081BK within a few days. I got it and tested it. A HUGE difference in feeling. I was able to get a good clean without the excessive vibrations. Customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothbrush as a replacement for my daughters kids Sonicare. I must admit that I was hesitant to try another brand at first, but I’m so glad that I did! This toothbrush exceeds my expectations especially for its price. My daughter loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Addicted 2 Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Great for braces
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get an electric toothbrush to help me with my oral hygiene + braces routine. It was difficult trying to find the best way to clean without breaking my wallet. This toothbrush is it. It's amazing and gets the job done for a great price. It even comes with another attachment that has a small fine tip - perfect for cleaning between my braces! This brush + a waterpik has changed my whole routine. It turns on for two minutes and has pauses in between so you know when it's time to switch sides. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Z.

customer_reviews.title: Affortable and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric toothbrush. I recently got braces so I needed a toothbrush that would clean throughly. It felt weird the first time I used it so I'm glad that the reviews and the product itself says it's normal. It was a little bit uncomfortable at first but then you get used to the vibrations. I also have gum recession due to all the years of brushing too hard, so I really needed it to avoid overbrushing. I really love the different speed settings and the pause cue timer to help you switch to a different area. Will definately recomment. Also the price is very reasonable unlike other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This thing. Seriously...
customer_reviews.text: This sexy, slim little black-and-gold toothbrush can save your day. I took it on a trip. For a week. I had charged it up about a week prior to the trip. Then I came back from that trip, forgot to recharge it, and took it on another trip, without the recharging cable...for three weeks. It outlived its promises and worked all the way through those three weeks. At this point, all the plastic is flaking off this little guy because a bunch of perfume got spilled all over him, but that's not his fault. I just ordered another one. Many thanks to Fairywill for making something simple and wonderful that exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I. Silveus

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Sonic Toothbrush and clean, clean teeth!
customer_reviews.text: So far this sonic toothbrush is great! Background: I had bought this for each of my family almost two years ago and bought myself a slightly more expensive one from another company that has a charging stand. Guess which one died? Mine. After about 8 months I think. Too late for a refund. My family’s sonic toothbrushes continued to work - so when I got round to replacing mine I bought this one (same as theirs). So far so good! And just on the sonic toothbrush topic, having gone without one for a month or so - it makes a HUGE difference. I won’t be without a sonic toothbrush again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Good travel tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this as my daily tooth brush for a couple of weeks now, it works as expected and has some interesting brush heads included. It's small size and good hand feel make it my choice for travel. Its vibrations are not as strong as a SonicCare so I have not decided if it is good enough to be my daily driver. Pro: Small size and rechargable through USB makes it great for traveling. Good hand feel, elegant design, quality look and feel. Con: not as strong vibrations as SonicCare and non-standard USB cable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like a Sonicare, about half the price...and maybe quality
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a sonicare. USB plug end is different. Nice appeal. Travel ready. My honest opinion...It feels like a toothbrush that was reverse engineered. It's not very personalble. Yes, it's a product, but things like the brush stem is too thick. It feels like it wasn't designed. The product is in my hand, because of $$$ Will the toothbrush last? I dunno? Will I use it? It's my main toothbrush. Nothing wrong with it, i dunno...i feel dirty for using it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for great price! Highly recommended all the way around!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been really going crazy looking for a good electric toothbrush that was not like insanely expensive and I have found it here!! Thank you sooo much! I love this! It comes with all kinds of different heads to really deep clean and it charges via USB port actually! High tech! Shipping and packaging could not have been better! I would definitely recommend this and order from them again! Thank you sooo much! Take care! Sincerely, Emily
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This will really clean your teeth. Bought a black one for my son for Christmas...he liked so much that I figured, why not! It times how long you have brushed and really makes your teeth feel like a hygientist was at work. Came with three replacement heads and a charger. I have yet to recharge and I have had it for three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Will never go wrong with this electric toothbrush!!
customer_reviews.text: I sure love my toothbrush The last one I had wasn't from this company but it was so powerful that it hurt my teeth so I had to send it back, this one here I will never send back I just love everything about it, the different controls on it clean, sensitive and etc, the massage I really love that one, It feels so good on my gums when I massage them. Thank you for having a toothbrush that I can really look forward to brushing my teeth and liking the way it feels not only on my teeth but also my gums Thank you again!! Carolina 😇
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Waterman

customer_reviews.title: NOW I KNOW!?
customer_reviews.text: I am OLD-School not a Minimal, a Baby-Boomer and thought why should I spend that much on an electric toothbrush when I have been using a manual one most of my life; and they are much cheaper. I was curious and wanted to test out this new fangled invention! I purchased this one and BOY! what I've been missing! Suddenly it was easier. My teeth felt much cleaner and smoother; my mouth felt fresh, it works! Would buy again. Brush has nice features and comes with extra brushes! BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy W. Rivers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very good brush!
customer_reviews.text: My first sonic toothbrush. It was a little strange at first, I wasn't sure if it was cleaning my teeth, but wow! When I finished brushing the first time I was surprised at how clean my teeth were. I waited a few weeks to leave a review and I am really impressed. My teeth are clean and my gums are improving. Very good brush at an affordable price. Although I have not bought replacement brushes yet, they are affordable as well. Friendly company also, they checked to see if I received my order and that I was satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I went to the dentist they would always tell me to try an electric toothbrush. I finally bought this one and couldn’t be more pleased with it. I charge it once a week and the battery life seems to last. My teeth feel so clean after using this. It does such a better job that just a plain toothbrush. The last dental cleaning I had, they told me my teeth were much better and that I should keep using this toothbrush because it’s down well for me. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ames

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 2 weeks ago and after using it, I immediately saw a difference in the color and overall health in my gums and my teeth look whiter and I didn’t even have to use any extra products, just the same toothpaste I use! In addition to my waterpik, my teeth have looked and feel better. Definitely a good buy and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: KIYA

customer_reviews.title: Get it..you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Theres nothing i dislike about this product so far..it cleans way better then a normal toothbrush esp between teeth and gums..I've had it for a cpl months and only charged it twice so far...I'm using it for traveling too now ..having the protective cover makes that safer also...i highly recommend this product to help avoid tooth abrasion and gum retention from brushing so hard...
customer_reviews.author: Greasemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice electric brush-don’t hesitate!!😬🦷💪🏼
customer_reviews.text: At first it was just me using this, but my hubby was very curious so I offered for him to use, since they’re several heads. I really liked it and he did too! Very powerful and offers several varieties of speed patterns. Works really well with Thieves natural toothpaste - makes my mouth feel dentist clean! So far it hasn’t pooped out on me, I guess I keep thinking it will because it is so inexpensive, but it’s still going after almost 2 months! Thank you for making an affordable electric toothbrush!
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Brushing is almost fun now!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first sonic style toothbrush and after only one day using it I’m hooked! Very simple to setup and the look and feel is very luxurious and comfortable. I tend to brush my teeth too hard and using this takes all of the guesswork out of how long and how hard I should brush. I love the pauses at 30 seconds reminding me to switch areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ruc22

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the company sent me a different model that I like MUCH better for no charge and did not ask me to send the first toothbrush back. It was super kind of them and speaks volumes about their customer service. So I bought this at the beginning of the year. I used it for a few weeks and really wasn't a fan. I used a regular toothbrush for awhile then decided to try this again. Still really dont like it. The brush head is too small and the vibrations make my mouth tickle. The description says it would take a while to get used to but I never got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Six weeks of battery
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Goby. The battery was garbage, and the head was not attached well to the body. They replaced the body three times, all had the same issues, and eventually I gave up and bought one of these. Holy moly, what a difference. Six weeks on the first charge, brushing twice a day, typically for three minutes each time. The vibrations are far stronger, leaving my teeth feeling clean. It's just overall a far better experience, and for half the price. Really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Better looking than my old sonic toothbrush and way less expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothbrush over 1 month ago and have only had to charge it one time. When I first got it, i charged as directed. I use it 2 to 3 times a day. It has not needed to be recharged since then. It feels a little different than my Sonicare. But nothing is different in how well it works. I lreally love the quad timer, and 3 different brushing modes. A toothbrush like this should just work and this does a great job for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Lvmycorcor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good toothbrush for the money. And it’s black. It comes with 3 heads, and best of all holds a charge for a long time. I bought this and charged it once a month or more ago, and it’s still going strong. I know I’m bound to have to recharge soon, but I am impressed. Easy to clean, no nasty base. I bought 2 more of these for family members. This works better than some of the expensive toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I love this toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush! My teeth feel really clean. It is slender and waterproof, both are really good. I have been using it for weeks and haven't had to charge it yet. I am keeping the box it came in as a travel case, but I just ended up sticking it in a pocket of my suitcase for a conference. With the little brush cap, it worked fine. No regrets buying this. I do wonder at the massage function. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: My teeth have never felt so clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have some slight overlap in my bottom teeth and I still have my wisdom teeth. This toothbrush cleans them great! Great purchase! Long battery life. Easy to change head for multiple users. I would recommend the "soft" brush. My granddaughter is getting braces soon and my daughter is a smoker. So I bought them one after my purchase. They love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: junebug

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I literally love these toothbrushes! I ordered one for myself and one for my husband. They Are rechargeable, but in the months and months that I've had mine, and use it twice a day or more, I have only charged it one time!!! It comes with extra heads which is awesome, and it's so easy to get used to! It tickles a bit at first, but that wears off after a few uses. The Fairywill company is just a wonderful company to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've used several electric toothbrushes over the years, Sonicare, Braun, and many more. After my Sonicare finally died, I found myself looking for a replacement. After reading some reviews online, I elected to try out the Fairywill brush, and I'm glad I did. The name of the brush may not sound familiar, but don't let that stop you, this is a very well made product, and it works just as well. The packaging of the brush is nicely laid out, and the brush charge lasts a very long time. Personally, I think you're getting a tremendous value at a great cost, and it is well worth the investment. Buy one, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: Really like this toothbrush. Just as good as other sonic brushes. Comes with several brushes and USB cord for charging. I like the fact it doesn't have a charging cradle. Charge last a long time. I actually haven't had to recharge it yet and it's been over a month. Bought one for my daughter and she really likes hers too. Well priced for all that comes with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected at an extremely fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sonicare toothbrushes for over a decade. This Fairywill Sonic toothbrush surpasses the Sonicare in design (it's much lighter, charge lasts much longer, brush head is smaller which is better for me and it has different brush modes) and price. Not only is the toothbrush much cheaper than most Sonicare models, but the replacement heads are very fairly priced. I think that the front runners in the electric toothbrush business are given a serious run for their money.
customer_reviews.author: BoBo

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I will be comfortable using anything other than the traditional toothbrush. Initially I did not like the feeling all the buzzing sounds in my mouth. After a few times use I am loving it. It is great for deep cleaning easy to reach areas hard to brush specifically the back teeth. It lie that it guides me about how much time to spend on each area with its beeps. Highly recommend to first time buyers and as a replacement for the regular users specially for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charge doesn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for 2 months but I’ve experienced issues with it charging correctly. It says it’s completely charged and the light turns on when you push the button however the vibration never turns on. If I lightly tap it then it sometimes turns on. Update: 9/12/2020 amazing customer service!!!! New item works great 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: very nice toothbrush that gets the job done right.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. This is my first sonic toothbrush. I am very impressed with the way my teeth feel super clean. I normally would have a tendency to press too hard with a toothbrush, but this one makes me feel uncomfortable with doing so. that is very good to save my gums from damage. I feel clean without pressing hard. Also the brush is nice looking and a very convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: K & P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A Most Needed Upgraded
customer_reviews.text: If you care even just the slightest about your teeth and dental health, an electric toothbrush is a mandatory upgrade to a normal brush. This toothbrush is very similar to another one I bought some time ago and works nearly identical. My mouth feels more clean, looks nicer, and actually feels like I’m actually brushing my teeth correctly after years of using a non-electric. This is one of the best purchases I’ve ever made and for a little over $20, I can’t recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This little brush packs a bunch. Each time I have used it my teeth felt clean and my gums lightly massaged. It is a great toothbrush. I really like that it is rechargeable and it holds a long charge. I also like that the package comes with additional brushes and a gift. I threw away my other brushes for this one. An excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and longlasting battery
customer_reviews.text: This brush is lightweight and easy to hold in hand, and a fully charged battery lasts for weeks. I also like that it has three modes: clean, sensitive and massage, as I prefer the sensitive one. My only reservation about this product is the brush head. Its wavy design creates deep curves on the bristles which fit the outside contours of my teeth, but awkward when I try to brush the inside surface. The twist-and-lock connection makes it hard, if not impossible, to replace the brush head with a different one, since most electronic brushes out there have snap-on heads.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Company replaced faulty with brand new!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the company reached out and said they would replace their product. It works great so far. I'm really glad they replaced it because my dentist recommended an electronic brush to keep plaque build up in hard to reach areas, and now I'm pregnant so dental hygiene is even more important. Thank you for honoring your customer & products and having the integrity to resend. ORIGINAL POST: I liked it until it stopped working. It only worked until it was time to charge it for the first time. After the first charge, it wouldn't turn on. Very disappointing. I kept the product to return but waited too long and it's probably too late.
customer_reviews.author: Travis & Megan Hantz

customer_reviews.title: Try it you’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this toothbrush. In my 60’s, and according to my dentist I have cakey build up of overnight plague. I have used this less than a week and it is gone. No fear of cavities or plague forming with continued use. I have PKD and the extra bacteria buildup would cause havoc on my kidneys when swallowing. Long story short, it’s a great tool to keep you healthy all around.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. D

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This was our 2nd Fairywill toothbrush in our household. We loved the first one so much I gave this one to my girlfriend for your birthday. Out of several less "practical" gifts, she told me that this toothbrush was her favorite! She loves how thoroughly it cleans her teeth and it's battery length is awesome (speaking from the other one that I already own and love as well). Definitely a smart buy!
customer_reviews.author: RIC80

customer_reviews.title: Electirc Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: It holds power. It does not rotate like I thought it did. It only vibrates. Update: Have had it for 5 months and it is still working and I am happy with it except for the fact that it does not vibrate. Customer service has been in contact with us and they have gone over and above trying to make it right. They sent us a new toothbrush that does rotate. We have not tried it yet, but we are very pleased with the level of customer service that we received from Fairywill. They did not stop until we were completely satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Barre

customer_reviews.title: Works fine at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommend I switch from an electric circular brush to a more traditional shaped brush. I found this sonic toothbrush at a huge cost savings over better known brands. I takes a little getting used to but seems to working fine. I love the long battery life. I will see my dentist in about a month and am looking forward to learning whether he can tell any difference.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Brock

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I had a Fairywill toothbrush with a round toothbrush head that finally wore out and was disappointed to find that style wasn't available anymore . So ordered this one and wasn't sure at first, but after a couple uses, feel it does a much better job. Very pleased and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair so far its working. My first one stopped working for some reason it wasn’t the battery but it stopped doing the vibration toothbrush strokes. But had to buy this again. My dentist noticed the difference since i started using electronic toothbrush. Great for deep cleaning. Comes with extra toothbrush heads which is a plus. Their Customer service contacted me and offered to replace or refund broken item which I appreciate
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush that holds it's charge. My only complaint is that I wish that at least one of the heads were bigger. The brush size is fairly small, I think smaller than even some kid's toothbrushes. Other than that it's great. Update: After posting a less than ecstatic review at the product I was contacted by the seller and asked how they could improve my experience. The customer service is amazing and I have yet to experience something like this from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedi Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've tried electric toothbrushes in the past and was not satisfied; Bbattery life was short, powerless, did not feel clean after brushing. This toothbrush is the opposite of all that. Battery lasts days, my teeth feel cleaner than they ever have, I love all of the different modes available, and delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: A.Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tooth brush and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got one for Christmas and loved it so i bought one for my wife and daughter and they are amazing. Love the rechargeable battery lasts a month easy and your teeth feel like you just left the dentist after a cleaning. You get emails from the company checking on you and its nice that they are there to support their products. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Obssesed

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 3!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased his about a year ago. I tried it w/one of the extra brush heads it came with and ended up getting one for myself. The battery lasts a very long time between charging. More importantly, this cleans so much better than the name brand ones we were previously buying and spending $100+ on. Our teeth feel like we just came from a dental cleaning afterwards. The lady who cleans my teeth at the dentist's office has told me the last 2x that they're so clean I haven't left her any work. I brush on the sensitive mode, which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Mom Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this toothbrush!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not only visually appealing but it works extremely well. It’s not to bulky and I really feel like it’s cleaning my teeth! This was a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ghia

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have very limited use of my right hand. This is the first toothbrush I have found that does such a good job with so little hand effort .I have tried brushes that cost way more than this one that did not do half as good of job cleaning my teeth. With three speeds and actions you will not find anything better. My dentist is so pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain sonic technology
customer_reviews.text: Came charged & ready to go!!! I threw the dice on this (after having more expensive, name brand sonic toothbrushes go bad too quickly), and one week in, am happy so far. I like the “freebie”, pointed brush head for occasional “flossless flossing”. I have sensitive teeth, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sock Monkey Fan

customer_reviews.title: I liked
customer_reviews.text: As for product presentation wrap, quality, loading time, I give it 5 stars. 4 stars in general because while you brush your teeth the brush vibrates, it does not turn on its own axis and it is what I was waiting for, you can change the different vibrations that it brings, I believe they are 3. It has another brush aside it is like to pass it through more places deep works very well. I do not know if it is better to brush or vibrate when it comes to washing teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush, feels as though it cleans very well. Holds a charge for a very long while, is comfortable to hold and great for traveling. Had a small issue where the protective cover on the brush head was placed crooked and crushed the bristles, but a quick email to the customer service team and they offered to replace the brush head in a speedy reply.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Six months later and my teeth still feel as good as the day I walked out of the dentist. Flossing probably contributes to 60% of that. Obviously, but it really is a good toothbrush over all.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hayes

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I’m so shocked at how much better this is than a normal toothbrush! Even after just the first use my teeth felt so much cleaner and whiter, I love this! I do have a question, there was a gift with it that is a smaller brush that almost looks like a gum cleaner, is that what that is??
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Proudfoot

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Before I start - I bought the toothbrush on my own, I'm not being paid or persuaded in any way to write this review... BUY IT!!!!! My gums feel SO MUCH BETTER! My teeth feel SO CLEAN! I have been having issues keeping my wisdom tooth clean but with the pointy attachment, it feels so clean and so do all of my teeth. It's hard to clean next to your gum line but this toothbrush is so helpful. 100/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: niknak

customer_reviews.title: Great dental checkups now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush!! Great product for the money!! I no longer cringe when I have my teeth clean at the dentist because ever since I bought this, I have had great checkups!! Easy to charge, which isn’t very often and kind of fun to use. Leaves your mouth feeling very clean. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: tlanden

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Been a user of Sonicate toothbrushes for more than 15 years. I have had this for about a month now and love the toothbrush. My mouth feels just as clean after using it and battery life has been good so far. The different brush heads are interesting to use too, but I have to wait to see if there is a long term difference with using them. Overall, the experience so far has been great!
customer_reviews.author: adb32310

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Regular, gentle and massage setting, 2 minute timer with 30 second pause feature. Water resistant and easy charging. My teeth feel cleaner after just a couple uses. The only thing that would put it over the top is if it had a micro USB charging port instead of proprietary plug. I do worry about keeping tracking to keep track of the specialty cable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good children's or travel sonic brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I didn't want to lug around my Waterpick Sonic toothbrush combo when traveling. It works well and I like the timer. I don't think I'll ever use all the modes, mostly the first two. I've used it for weeks and haven't needed to charge it yet. The instructions say it will last about 30 days before needing to be charged with just a basic USB cord.
customer_reviews.author: holkay mom

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, not as good as my name brand... I bought this to take on a trip, and for that purpose, it worked well.. Small in size, and the vibration frequency just doesn't seem to be as strong as my other brush.. Way better than a regular brush though...
customer_reviews.author: Joel J.

customer_reviews.title: The BOMB
customer_reviews.text: I loveee this product. I have braces and I have had them for 2 years going on 3. Let me tell youuuu that a manual has nothing on this toothbrush my fellow train track friends. My teeth feel like I just left the dentist. I am so upset that I didn't buy it sooner. I have had it since Tuesday I haven't needed to charge it. My favorite part is the interdental brush 👏🏾👏🏾 Get this you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: QueenJash

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite Toothbrush so far! I love this toothbrush. Battery life holds up really well. The timer is great. The different settings on the toothbrush are a plus as well. And they also give you some replacement heads as well. And the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this. The small head(s) are great for reaching your back teeth. The different settings are a huge plus. I’ve had this for quite some time, haven’t had to charge it even once yet. It’s sleek, modern, effective, and totally great for the price point. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Usage is ok enough
customer_reviews.text: This was my first electronic toothbrush. The package arrived on time and was neatly packaged with charger, electronic brush and additional bristles. The product, though affordable, doesnt appear cheap. Use of the product however was nothing exceptional as you have to be quite patient even when using the faster mode. The brushes are also very soft. Nonetheless, you do get the feel of a proper clean. This brush is also good for travel kits.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My old toothbrush was oral b and it was battery operated. I was having to change the batteries every 2 weeks. I love that this one is USB charged. Worked right out of the box. The box showed a black toothbrush so I was worried I was sent the wrong one but it was PINK like I wanted! Many settings and it came with 2 extra brush heads and a pick like one for between teeth. I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for a great Sonic Toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Fairywel Sonic toothbrush for my husband. He likes it. It is rechargeable thru any USB port. It seems to be holding the charge as advertised. He thinks the charge will last for approximately 30 days. It is a great deal. It came with two extra toothbrush heads and a tooth pick. Does a great job of cleaning his teeth.
customer_reviews.author: 48 Fan

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Update: my toothbrush just stopped working. It has been 8 months. I take very good care of it and it will not turn on. It is charged, it is clean. I don’t know what happened. This is actually a very nice toothbrush. I love it s far
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: Just the facts
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good TB. The jury is still out 12/1- Update review So this is the 2nd part of this review. At first I wasn’t really impressed with the Tb. The construction was ok but the power was weak. I think it was a random Tb gone rogue. However, Fairy Way Co customer service is excellent though. 10 Star ⭐️. They wanted to know what my dental health needs were to find me a good solution. I ended up with an efficient product that is surprisingly amazing. Construction on this brush is good. It looks like the picture. Powerful yet gently. Definitely a good solution. Now if they just knew of a great dentist 😉 4 +Stars💫
customer_reviews.author: Miss YORK

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality was not what I expected from an electronic toothbrush, the mouth was so small and would not even clean my 10year teath. Wish I could return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mompreneur

customer_reviews.title: Teeth are cleaner than ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothbrush for my daughter because I have one I love. This toothbrush is small and easily reaches the hard to reach parts of her mouth where her other toothbrush wouldnt fit. Her teeth are visibly cleaner than ever before, even her dentist was impressed. I love that this only needs to charge once a month or so. The extra heads are great. I also like the travel case.
customer_reviews.author: CRISTIN BARNA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I usually figure you get what you pay for; however, this toothbrush you get much more than expected. Other versions of the sonic toothbrush cost 3 plus times what this one does yet I can't fathom them cleaning my teeth any better. After the first use, I could tell a difference in how clean my teeth were. I liked it so much I bought my wife one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Honudad

customer_reviews.title: try it!
customer_reviews.text: i discovered fairywill last year and have had excellent results. i have used electric toothbrushes in the past and find this product to be the best. the value and features cannot be beat. the brush allows for thorough tooth cleaning and the light weight is much easier to use than others i have tried in the past. the charge seems to last for months. the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this electric toothbrush for the price! Charges in two hours using an Apple USB adapter and haven’t had to charge since. Works perfectly and comes with different replacement heads for those with braces and those using activated charcoal to whiten your teeth. I have been using it for about two weeks now and have already noticed how much cleaner my teeth feel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amcooper2006

customer_reviews.title: Cleans your teeth wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric toothbrush I have ever had. I have had it for a month now and I still haven’t had to charge it. And it is still going strong and it is very good and clean your teeth. Thank you so much for your project thank you so much for the fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Haigler Sheets

product_meta.title: Fairywill Sonic Electric Toothbrush Rechargeable for Adults and Kids, ADA Accepted, 3 Brush Heads Included, 4 Hours Charge Minimum 30 Days Use, Dentists Recommend, Build in 2 Mins Timer Black
feature_bullets: ADA ACCEPTED CLEAN- The ADA is the professional association of dentists dedicated to serving both the public and the profession of dentistry. The ADA promotes the public's health through commitment of member dentists to provide quality oral health care, accessible to everyone. Fairywill always works to give you the highest level of quality and care, that is why we associate ourselves with the best and work to give you the best.

IF YOU WANT TO FIND AN POWERFUL ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSH - up to 40,000 micro brushes per minute, effective remove more stains than a regular manual toothbrush. W-shape bristles suits teeth topography, reaches to the deep area and has a deep cleaning. Clean your teeth just like the dentist does! Get a thorough cleaning, an overall upgrade over other regular electric toothbrush.

A TOOTHBRUSH THAT CAN ACCOMPANY WITH YOU AROUND THE WORLD - One single charge of 4 hours lasts 30 days which makes it perfect for use at home and on travel. Wherever you go you don't have to worry about running out of power. You're Free from frequent charging from now on! The USB charging cable of this electrical toothbrush is compatible with any charger or equipment with a USB port. Global voltage, No matter which country you travel to, Fairywill toothbrush FW508 always is your good choice.

2 MINUTE BUILT-IN TIMER - Auto-timed feature helps to ensure a dentist recommended cleaning habbit. There is an interval vibration reminder after every 30 seconds to let you know that it is time to move to clean the next quadrant of mouth, and it will shut off automatically when 2 minutes is up. It is waterproof rated IPX7, so you can use it safly at shower.

WHAT'S MORE? - FADING REMINDER BRISTLES - Come with 3 replacement brush heads, when the blue bristles on both ends fade and turn white over time, this indicates that brush heads need to be replaced for optimal results. Multi-function Modes Meet All of Your Daily cleaning neededs. More surprises await your discovery.
